summary: The supply chain for information and communication technologies can be an access point for hackers. Compromised SolarWinds Orion network management software, for example, was sent to an estimated 18,000 customers. We testified about the government's SolarWinds response and agency efforts to reduce supply chain vulnerability. The response included a coordinated effort to help agencies find and remove the threats to their systems. In a 2020...
title: Cybersecurity: Federal Agencies Need to Implement Recommendations to Manage Supply Chain Risks
